EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.S1P Mobile App + Planning Your Schedule 9-1
EmailTemplate.subject: Build your conference schedule on the SpringOne Platform Mobile App
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We look forward to welcoming you at SpringOne Platform 2018! The conference mobile app is now available. Access the mobile app to locate your sessions, receive up-to-date conference information, and view the conference agenda. Log in to build your custom event schedule using your SpringOne Platform registration email address and password. Download the SpringOne Platform mobile app from iTunes <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/springone-platform/id1412120544?mt=8]]> or Google Play <[[https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.attendease.pivotal.springone2018]]>. <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/springone-platform/id1412120544?mt=8]]> <[[https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.attendease.pivotal.springone2018]]>
Please note that all sessions are first come, first served, regardless of pre-event selection (except for training and workshops). You aren’t making a seat reservation, just building your personal schedule.
Get the latest conference updates from @S1P <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]> and use #springone <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/springone]]> to tell us about your SpringOne Platform experience.
Thank you, and we look forward to seeing you at the event!
The SpringOne Platform Team
